manageAreas.label: Areas
manageAreas.hint: Select the geographical areas that the service zone covers.

fields.noRecords: There are no service zones to add shipping options to.
fields.tip: A service zone is a collection of geographical zones or areas. It's used to restrict available shipping options to a defined set of locations.

bundles.label: Quick Country Selection
bundles.hint: Select a predefined set of countries to quickly create a service zone.

eu.name: European Union (all countries)
eu.description: All 27 EU member states including Poland

euWithoutPoland.name: European Union (without Poland)
euWithoutPoland.description: All EU countries except Poland - useful when Poland has a separate zone

bestPractices.label: Best Practices
bestPractices.intro: We recommend creating the following service zones for optimal shipping management:
bestPractices.poland: Zone for Poland with shipping options for Poland (e.g., InPost Parcel Locker, InPost Courier)
bestPractices.eu: Zone for EU (without Poland) with shipping options for European countries
bestPractices.usa: Zone for USA with shipping options for United States
bestPractices.canada: Zone for Canada with shipping options for Canada
bestPractices.note: Each zone should have appropriate shipping options with prices tailored to the region. Use 'Quick Country Selection' above to quickly add multiple countries at once.

shippingProfile.subtitle: Group products with similar shipping requirements into profiles.

create.hint: Create a new shipping profile to group products with similar shipping requirements.
create.customProfileHint: Use this option to create a profile for region-specific restrictions. For example, if you have a standard parcel that ships to Poland, Germany, and Czech Republic, but want to restrict a specific product to Poland only, create a custom profile for it.
create.customNamePlaceholder: For example: Paczka standardowa Polska, Standard Parcel Poland Only
create.customNameHint: Enter a descriptive name that indicates the region restriction
create.customTypeHint: Select the base transport type for this custom profile
create.errorMissingData: Error creating shipping profile: Missing data in response
create.duplicateError: A shipping profile named "{{name}}" already exists.

delete.title: Delete Shipping Profile
delete.description: You are about to delete the shipping profile {{name}}. Assigned shipping options will also be deleted. Products will require assigning new profiles. This action cannot be undone.
delete.warningWithProducts:
⚠️ {{count}} {{count_plural}} assigned to this profile.

After deleting the profile, products will not have an assigned shipping profile and will require reassignment.
delete.warningWithShippingOptions:
⚠️ This profile has {{count}} shipping {{count_plural}}.

Shipping options will also be deleted along with the profile.
delete.warningBoth:
⚠️ This profile has:
• {{productCount}} {{product_plural}} assigned
• {{optionCount}} shipping {{option_plural}}

After deleting the profile:
• Products will not have an assigned shipping profile
• All shipping options will be deleted

tooltip.type: Enter shipping profile type, for example: Heavy, Oversized, Freight-only, etc.

baselinker.syncToBaselinkerDescription: Push stock levels from Medusa to BaseLinker
baselinker.syncFromBaselinkerDescription: Pull stock levels from BaseLinker to Medusa
baselinker.pollOrdersDescription: Check BaseLinker for order status updates
baselinker.fulfillmentSyncDescription: Sync fulfillment status changes from BaseLinker back to Medusa (packed, shipped, delivered)
baselinker.fulfillmentSyncWarning: Fulfillment sync requires status mapping. You will configure this in the next step.
baselinker.notConnectedYet: Connect your BaseLinker account to get started
baselinker.apiTokenHint: Find this in BaseLinker → Settings → API
baselinker.inventoryIdHint: Find this in BaseLinker → Inventory → Settings
baselinker.tokenSecured: Your API token is securely stored and encrypted

validation.required: API Token and Inventory ID are required

setup.title: BaseLinker Setup
setup.description: Connect and configure your BaseLinker integration

connection.title: Connect BaseLinker
connection.description: Enter your BaseLinker API credentials to connect your account.

features.title: Enable Features
features.description: Choose which sync features to enable.

statusMapping.title: Map Order Statuses
statusMapping.description: Map your BaseLinker order statuses to Medusa fulfillment actions. This is required for fulfillment sync to work correctly.
statusMapping.hintText: Map at least one status to "Create Shipment" (for when order is shipped) and one to "Mark Delivered" (for when order is delivered).

carrierMapping.title: Map Carriers
carrierMapping.description: Map your BaseLinker carriers to ensure proper tracking information is synced.

carrierQuestion.title: Do you have integrated carriers in BaseLinker?
carrierQuestion.description: If you use carrier integrations (InPost, DPD, etc.) in BaseLinker, you should map them to ensure proper tracking.

complete.title: Setup Complete!
complete.description: Your BaseLinker integration is now configured and ready to use.
complete.readyDescription: Click "Finish Setup" to connect your BaseLinker account with the configured settings.

setupIncomplete.title: Setup Incomplete
setupIncomplete.statusMapping: Status mapping is required for fulfillment sync to work.
setupIncomplete.carrierMapping: Carrier mapping is recommended for proper tracking.

import.title: Import from BaseLinker
import.description: Import products from BaseLinker with category mapping
import.loadError: Failed to load products from BaseLinker
import.categoryMappingDescription: Connect your BaseLinker categories to marketplace categories. Products will be automatically assigned.
import.pleaseWait: Please wait, this may take a few minutes.
import.selectiveTip: Tip: Only selected products will be imported
import.selectAllTip: Tip: Select specific products to import only those, or set up all products to import everything
import.selectedNeedSetup: {{count}} of {{total}} selected products need category or shipping
